name: C=Rex Offline
overview: Genesis Project proudly presents a new game for your favourite computer: C=Rex Offline - A C64 adaptation of the popular Chrome offline T-rex game. We released it at Datastorm in Gothenburg (We handed out 40 copies on disk too). Coded by Wertstahl, idea and testing by hedning, and music by our great friend LFT. Enjoy! release party : Datastorm Summer 2017
